entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
